GSP30anuttaru:0: saṃkrāmo 'tra na bhāvanā na ca kathāyuktir na carcā na ca
GSP30anuttaru:1: dhyānaṃ vā na ca dhāraṇā na ca japābhyāsaprayāso na ca /
GSP30anuttaru:2: tat kiṃ nāma suniścitaṃ vada paraṃ satyaṃ ca tacchrūyatāṃ
GSP30anuttaru:3: na tyāgī na parigrahī bhaja sukhaṃ sarvaṃ yathāvasthitaḥ // 1 //
GSP30anuttaru:4: saṃsāro 'sti na tattvatas tanubhṛtāṃ bandhasya vārtaiva kā
GSP30anuttaru:5: bandho yasya na jātu tasya vitathā muktasya muktikriyā /
GSP30anuttaru:6: mithyāmohakṛd eṣa rajjubhujagacchāyāpiśācabhramo mā kiṃcit tyaja
GSP30anuttaru:9: kila kasya kena vidadhe ko vā praveśakramaḥ /
GSP30anuttaru:10: māyeyam na cidadvayāt paratayā bhinnāpy aho vartate sarvaṃ
GSP30anuttaru:18: vyaktiṃ paśyasi yasya yasya sahasā tattattadekātmatāsaṃvidrūpam
GSP30anuttaru:20: pūrvābhāvabhavakriyā hi sahasā bhāvāḥ sadā 'smin bhave
GSP30anuttaru:24: bhāvānāṃ na samudbhavo 'sti sahajas tvadbhāvitā bhānty amī
GSP30anuttaru:25: niḥsatyā api satyatām anubhavabhrāntyā bhajanti kṣaṇam /
GSP30anuttaru:26: tvatsaṅkalpaja eṣa viśvamahimā nāsty asya janmānyataḥ
GSP30anuttaru:27: tasmāt tvaṃ vibhavena bhāsi bhuvaneṣv ekopy anekātmakaḥ // 7 //
GSP30anuttaru:28: yat satyaṃ yad asatyam alpabahulaṃ nityaṃ na nityaṃ ca yat
GSP30anuttaru:29: yan māyāmalinaṃ yad ātmavimalaṃ ciddarpaṇe rājate /
